item.title: Tate brothers human trafficking case sent back by Romanian court
item.description: A court upholds the influencer's challenge of the human trafficking case against him and his brother.

item.title: BBC's Steve Rosenberg challenges Putin on his 25-year rule of Russia
item.description: Russian President Vladimir Putin was speaking at an annual end-of-year press conference.

item.title: Gis√®le Pelicot's ex-husband jailed for 20 years in mass rape trial
item.description: The convictions bring to an end France's largest ever rape trial, which has shocked the country and world.

item.title: I should have invaded Ukraine earlier, Putin tells Russians in TV marathon
item.description: Putin tells an end-of-year press conference there should have been "systemic preparation" for the full-scale invasion.

item.title: Dozens of children killed in crush at Nigerian Christmas funfair
item.description: The widely advertised event saw large numbers of children show up, leading to a deadly crush.
